definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: AIM: To study extraction process with the aid of cyclodextrin (EPAC) of Radix Salvias Miltiorrhizae.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究環糊精輔助提取丹蔘的工藝。

sentences.english: Cyclodextrins are natural degradation products of starch.
sentences.chinese: 環糊精是澱粉的天然降解產品。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the progress of liposome entrapped cyclodextrin complex delivery systems.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹環糊精包合物脂質體給藥系統的研究進展。

sentences.english: This article reviews the present applications of cyclodextrins in chiral drug resolution.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了環糊精在手性藥物拆分中的應用情況。

sentences.english: The development progress of the application of cyclodextrin in enantioseparation was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了環糊精在對映體分離中的研究進展。

sentences.english: Accordingly, a class of sulfated cyclodextrins has been developed for this purpose.
sentences.chinese: 因此，發展了一系列硫酸鹽環糊精。

sentences.english: In this paper, technical processing of indigestible dextrin is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了以澱粉爲原料製造難消化糊精的工藝過程。

sentences.english: Cyclodextrin glycosyltransferase(CGTase) is used for the industrial production of cyclodextrins.
sentences.chinese: 環糊精葡萄糖轉移酶在工業上用於生產環糊精。

sentences.english: Cyclodextrin glycosyltransferase(CGTase) is used for the industrial production of cyclodextrins.
sentences.chinese: 環糊精葡萄糖轉移酶在工業上用於生產環糊精。

sentences.english: The microsphere is prepared with diisocyanate as crosslinking agent and through condensation with cyclodextrin monomer.
sentences.chinese: 微球以二異氰酸酯爲交聯劑，與環糊精單體縮合而成。

sentences.english: Kinds and important characteristics of cyclodextrin derivatives are also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了環糊精衍生物的種類及主要特性。

sentences.english: ResultsThe optimization assistance materials are the sugar and dextrin.
sentences.chinese: 結果優選輔料爲糖粉和糊精。

sentences.english: The enzyme, cyclodextrin glycosyltransferase, converts starch into cyclodextrins via an intramolecular transglycosylation reaction.
sentences.chinese: 它可通過環化作用將澱粉轉化成環糊精。

sentences.english: Cyclodextrin inclusion complexes as pharmaceutical carriers.
sentences.chinese: 環糊精包容的絡合物作爲藥物載體。

sentences.english: The effects of some protein modification reagents on the activity of cyclodextrin glucanotransferase(CGTase) have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 不同蛋白質修飾劑對環糊精葡萄糖基轉移酶進行修飾。

sentences.english: Maltodextrin is a main negative factor to the crystallization process of maltose.
sentences.chinese: 糊精是妨礙麥芽糖結晶和晶漿過濾的主要因素。

definition: xanthan/xanthanate gum (polysaccharide food additive used as a thickener)
